name: Million Gold Slots - Vegas Style Slot Machine
name_original: Million Gold Slots - Vegas Style Slot Machine
description:

Get also the chance to win the HUGE $1,000,000 ONLINE JACKPOT on every spin! Spin the reels and get up to 10 free spins when you play. Get free spins, win the jackpot and feel the rush of Las Vegas!

Download and enjoy all the classic feature of a real Las Vegas Casino Slot Machine such as FREE SPINS, ONLINE JACKPOT, WILD and SCATTERS symbols all this in a small download size game. Download ans enjoy this New Slots 2017 game and win big amount of Gold!

- Welcome CREDITS OF $50,000!
- Free CREDITS every 5 MINUTES
- Get a chance to win the online running Jackpot of $1,000,000 !
- Beautiful reel slot feeling and sound of VEGAS
- High Definitions graphics and fun sound effects


Download and Play Gold Slots Machine Casino Game NOW!

This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
